    • Method Detail

      • addPlan

        public void addPlan(PhasePlan plan)
        Add a new phase plan to our collection. If it is the first then this will also be the currPlan.
        Parameters:
        plan - the plan to add

      • cycle

        public void cycle()
        Start cycling through the current phase plan. Once we begin we can only return if the cycle method of our plan terminates.

      • cycle

        public void cycle(int nCycles)
        Start cycling through the current phase plan. Once we begin we can only return if the cycle method of our plan terminates.
        Parameters:
        nCycles - number of cycles through plan to do.

      • recoverObservers

        public void recoverObservers()
        Prior to serialisation this intersection may have had TrafficStreams that were observed by one or more SignalFaces. That association (observer registration) is not preserved after de-serialisation. This method (which should only be called once (immediately after de-serialisation) is a crude way to restore the original observer registrations.
